about_the_game:
Introduction


"Cats in ten" is a digital puzzle synthesis game. The game picture is simple and fresh, the operation is simple and easy to use, but it's not easy to become a master~

Game Features


Each number is a different cat image. There are also vivid cat sound effects, which make people feel the fun of rolling cats!

Play Method


1. After entering the game, cats with different numbers will drop from the top. Players must quickly synthesize 10 through the dropped numbers to make the cat ball disappear. Otherwise, the game will fail if the cat ball is spread all over the screen.

2. Players can double-click the split number to get the number they want, and quickly close 10.

3. The game has different modes. In each mode, the speed of cat ball falling is different, which requires players to use their brains to calculate quickly and test your hand speed.

4. This is a simple game that everyone can play, but it is rare to drive genius crazy. Players can also enjoy the fun of cat elimination in the process of using their brains!

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: 《猫咪合十》是一款数字益智合成小游戏。 游戏界面简介清新，操作简单易上手。
